title: Void Seal (Part 2)
body:
Void Seal (Part 2)

"Fu*k, is he coming here because of the aura this guy releasing?" Evan said in a heavy voice when he lost connection with the Wind and Lightning Sheep and received the message that it was Walter who killed it.

'I need to retrieve that Soul Beacon...'

Because the Wind and Lightning Sheep was killed by Walter, the mid-level Rank One Soul Beacon he gave it also dropped to the place where it was killed.

Using the Soul Beacon skill, he could tell that the beacon was only three thousand kilometres away from his location, and even if he used it to teleport away from his current location, Momon would easily catch up with him using his high stat points.

Moreover, now along with Momon, the bulky man, and the elf who were looking at him with their red eyes, he also had to deal with Walter.

In the literal sense, his situation was completely messed up.
